```swift
func addWordToList() {
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â let usersWord = 
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â userEnteredWord.trimmingCharacters(in: 
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â .whitespacesAndNewlines).lowercased()
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â //is the word a duplicate
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â if !isWordDuplicate(word: usersWord) {
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â displayErrorMessage(messageTitle: "You already used
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â this word", description: "Keep looking!")
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â return
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â }
Â Â Â //is the word possible given your base word letters 
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â to work with?
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â guard isWordFoundInBaseWord(userGuessWord:
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â usersWord) else {
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â displayErrorMessage(messageTitle: "This word is
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â not possible", description: "Create only words
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â from the letters in the given word")
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â return
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â }
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â userEnteredWordsArray.insert(usersWord, at: 0)
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â userEnteredWord = ""Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â 
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â }
```

```swift
 func isWordInDictionary(word: String) -> Bool {
Â Â Â Â return UITextChecker().rangeOfMisspelledWord(in: word,
Â Â Â Â Â Â range: NSRange(location: 0, length:
Â Â Â Â Â Â word.utf16.count), startingAt: 0, wrap: false,
Â Â Â Â Â Â language: "en").isNotFound
Â Â Â Â }
```
